feed.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Conference: Call For Papers open

entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Conference: Call For Papers open
entry.summary: The organizers of Bitcoin2012 conference have announced the opening of the call for papers and are inviting proposals from interested speakers. The delay in the opening of the call for papers has been apologized for by the organizers. Those who wish to submit their proposals can email them to genjix at bitcoin2012.com.Additionally, a list of speakers for the conference is available on the event's website. It is a great opportunity for experts in the field of Bitcoin and cryptocurrency to share their knowledge and insights with the audience. With the increasing popularity of Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, this conference is expected to attract a lot of attention from enthusiasts and professionals alike.The Bitcoin2012 conference is an important event that brings together industry leaders, developers, researchers, and enthusiasts to discuss the latest trends and developments related to Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. The conference provides a platform for networking, learning, and sharing experiences among participants.Overall, the opening of the call for papers for the Bitcoin2012 conference presents an exciting opportunity for those interested in presenting their ideas and research in the field of Bitcoin and cryptocurrency. With the list of speakers already available on the event's website, attendees can expect a wealth of knowledge and insights from the experts in attendance.
